item.title: Musk is leaving the Trump administration after leading effort to slash federal government
item.description: Elon Musk said Wednesday that he is leaving his role as a special government employee for the Trump administration, a move that was expected.

item.title: U.S. trade court rules against Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs
item.description: The U.S. Court of International Trade ruled Wednesday that President Trump exceeded his authority when he imposed his "Liberation Day" tariffs.
